articles.description: IRFC Share Price NSE, IRFC Share Price Target 2022, 2023: IRFC share price has surged above the IPO price of Rs 26. Analysts are bullish on IRFC and have revised the target price to Rs 40. IRFC recently paid 8 per cent dividend per share to its shareholders.
